headline: Ask HN: What do you create (tech and otherwise)?
description:
What are all the different kinds of things that you create?

Do you design/develop games? Build websites? Other tech stuff?

Do you write novels? Essays? Poetry? Etc

Do you make physical stuff? Woodwork or metalwork? Sculpture? Furniture? Gadgets? Etc

Do you draw or paint? Make comics? Graffiti? Tattoo?!

Do you make music? Sing? Dance? Do you conduct an orchestra?? Are you in a heavy metal band??!!

Anything else? Dominoes? Miniature cities? Surprise us ;)

Links to your works would be phenomenal! And you can get new fans!
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你创造了什么（技术和其他）？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你創造了什麼（技術和其他）？
description_zh-Hans:
你创造的所有不同种类的东西是什么？

你设计/开发游戏吗？建立网站吗？其他技术性的东西？

你写小说吗？散文？诗歌？等等

你制作实体东西吗？木工或金属制品？雕塑？家具？小玩意？Etc

Do you draw or paint? Make comics? Graffiti? Tattoo?!

Do you make music? Sing? Dance? Do you conduct an orchestra?? Are you in a heavy metal band??!!

Anything else? Dominoes? Miniature cities? Surprise us ;)

Links to your works would be phenomenal! And you can get new fans!
description_zh-Hant:
你創造的所有不同種類的東西是什麼？

你設計/開發遊戲嗎？建立網站嗎？其他技術性的東西？

你寫小說嗎？散文？詩歌？等等

你製作實體東西嗎？木工或金屬製品？雕塑？傢俱？小玩意？Etc

Do you draw or paint? Make comics? Graffiti? Tattoo?!

Do you make music? Sing? Dance? Do you conduct an orchestra?? Are you in a heavy metal band??!!

Anything else? Dominoes? Miniature cities? Surprise us ;)

Links to your works would be phenomenal! And you can get new fans!
